name: Hi-Res Adventure #5: Time Zone
content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the game file
game:
  game_id: hires5
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      src_path=$(echo "$1" | sed -r "s/(.+)\/.+/\1/")

      find "$src_path" -type f \( -iname "TZONE*.*" \) -exec cp {} "$dst" \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: $game $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
